data.title: Madonna, I’m Going To Tell You A Secret CD & DVD (Warner) **
data.meta_description: The British promoters of Madonna's last tour did a great disservice to Yorkshire fans. Not only were tickets £165, but it was announced the only…
data.text:
Days after selling out London, extra dates were added in Manchester, upsetting long-term fans already committed to the capital's shows. Although a good concert, Kylie and Cher did far more spectacular shows in the same season.

Tour film Secret' is a sequel to the far more exciting In Bed With Madonna, showing the rock goddess on her global tour.

Whereas the 1990 movie had iconic moments featuring an empty Evian bottle and the public humiliation of Kevin Costner, Secret is nothing special, the highlight being Guy Ritchie singing along to The Pogues while driving to one of his wife's gigs.
